TopicTitle: Exit Kerbol’s Sphere of Influence in as Little Time as Possible

Articles.Content:
The title really says it all.  Fly a mission where you manage to exit the sphere of influence of Kerbol.  The less time the better.  This could be real world time and/or game world time.

Edited August 31, 2023 by Davidian1024
corrected grammar
I'd like to see someone do it, I'm not patient enough xD I have a probe on an escape trajectory, but it will take a little under 300000 years before it exits kerbol's SOI.
there were a few bugs that allowed me to do it.  but they were fixed two or three patches ago.
